'''Radiant Spincrystal 47''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Miko's Night]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to the shrine in front of [[Kano Nana]] in [[Grand Narukami Shrine]].
